Automation

Use traffic flow automation to simplify cloud management, eliminate time-consuming repetitive tasks, and improve reliability and efficiency

Apply for trial Purchase now

With Automation, you can save time, reduce errors, and increase efficiency, while lowering your operational costs. Automate all of your frequent, time-consuming, and error-prone cloud management tasks to free up more time for work that adds business value.

Automation runbooks can handle websites, Virtual Machines, Storage, SQL Server, and other popular Azure services. You can also use them to connect and manage any service that has a public Internet API.

Pricing Details

Automation is offered in two tiers: Free and Basic. The Basic tier of Automation is billed on the basis of the number of minutes of job runtime used during a month. Whenever there are one or more jobs running, the Basic tier of Automation will be charged. Jobs are aggregated across geographical regions.

*The following prices are tax-inclusive.

*Monthly price estimates are based on 744 hours of usage per month.

FAQs

Expand all
  • How is Basic tier billed?

    We bill you based on the total number of minutes of job runtime used between all Automation accounts associated with your subscription. For example, using 5,000 minutes in one month will result in a RMB 50 charge.

  • Is an Automation quota applied for free usage at the subscription level?

    Yes. If you want to use 500 more minutes of Automation per subscription per month, you need to convert it to the Basic tier.

  • Can I upgrade my Automation service from the Free version to the Basic version?

    Yes, upgrades to existing Automation subscriptions can be supported by updating the tier attribute on the Scaling page for the Automation accounts in the subscription. The upgrade will apply to all Automation accounts in the subscription.

Support and Service Level Agreements

If you have any questions or need help, please visit Azure Support to select self-service or any other methods to contact us for support.

We guarantee that at least 99.9% of jobs will begin within 30 minutes of the scheduled start time.

No service level agreement is offered for the Free tier of Automation.

If you want to learn more about the details of our server level agreement, please visit the Service Level Agreement page.
